overview: Blue Sky is about a group of [Czech] boys who work at a small light plane airport, who do more than just service or wash the planes. There is a mixture of tall thin and young stud puppy type bodies - all are smooth and mostly lightly tanned. A highlight is a bareback scene that includes two delightful cum in the mouth moments which takes place in one of the light aircraft between two blond haired boys
title: Blue Sky
